p: Although São Paulo has reached 90% coverage, YF cases are still being confirmed mainly in the region denominated Vale do Ribeira. In 2019, 86 cases were reported with 23 discarded, 32 confirmed and 31 under investigation. In this period, nine deaths (28.1% of lethality) have already been confirmed. Still in the state of São Paulo, epizootics were reported in 281 municipalities. This shows that despite the intense vaccination campaigns, the virus continues to spread to new regions [ 40].
